home.story_desc_2: Our commitment to sustainability and ethical production ensures that every product not only looks beautiful but also contributes to a better future.

home.exclusive_desc: Premium quality products crafted with attention to detail

product.easy_returns_desc: Just return your product and we'll refund your money. No questions asked – we'll do our best to make sure your return is hassle-free.

chat.title: Customer Support
chat.welcome: Hi! Welcome to Medusa Store. How can I help you today?

size_guide.title: Size Guide
size_guide.chest_description: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape horizontal.
size_guide.chest_instruction: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape horizontal.
size_guide.waist_description: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape comfortably loose.
size_guide.waist_instruction: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape comfortably loose.
size_guide.hips_description: Measure around the fullest part of your hips, about 8 inches below your waist.
size_guide.hips_instruction: Measure around the fullest part of your hips, about 8 inches below your waist.
size_guide.length_description: Measure from the highest point of your shoulder down to your desired length.
size_guide.length_instruction: Measure from the highest point of your shoulder down to your desired length.
size_guide.fit_tip_1: If you're between sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit.
size_guide.fit_tip_2: Our garments are designed for a regular fit. Check product details for specific fit notes.
size_guide.fit_tip_3: Still unsure? Contact our customer service team for personalized sizing advice.

cart.empty_cart_message: You don't have anything in your cart. Let's change that, use the link below to start browsing our products.
cart.sign_in_better_experience: Sign in for a better experience.

checkout.billing_same_as_shipping: Billing address same as shipping address
checkout.review_terms_text: By clicking the Place Order button, you confirm that you have read, understand and accept our Terms of Use, Terms of Sale and Returns Policy and acknowledge that you have read Medusa Store's Privacy Policy.
checkout.saved_address_greeting: Hi {name}, do you want to use one of your saved addresses?

account.sign_in_description: Sign in to access an enhanced shopping experience.
account.register_description: Create your Medusa Store Member profile, and get access to an enhanced shopping experience.
account.register_terms_text: By creating an account, you agree to Medusa Store's
account.got_questions_description: You can find frequently asked questions and answers on our customer service page.

returns.page_subtitle: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase
returns.policy_description: We offer a hassle-free 7-day return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 7 days of delivery for a full refund.
returns.condition_unused_description: Items must be in their original condition, unused and unworn.
returns.condition_tags_description: All original tags and labels must be attached.
returns.condition_packaging_description: Items must be returned in their original packaging.
returns.condition_proof_description: Include your order number or receipt with the return.
returns.process_step1_description: Email us at support@vlora.com with your order number and reason for return.
returns.process_step2_description: We'll provide you with a return authorization number and shipping instructions.
returns.process_step3_description: Package the item securely and ship it to the address provided.
returns.process_step4_description: Once we receive and inspect your return, we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.
returns.refund_timeline_description: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return.
returns.refund_method_description: Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.
returns.refund_shipping_description: Original shipping costs are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error.
returns.nonreturnable_item1: Items on final sale or marked as non-returnable
returns.nonreturnable_item4: Items without original tags or packaging
returns.contact_description: Our customer service team is here to assist you with your return.

shipping.page_subtitle: Fast and reliable shipping to your doorstep
shipping.free_shipping_description: Enjoy complimentary standard shipping on all orders above $100
shipping.standard_description: Reliable delivery at an affordable rate
shipping.processing_description: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed on the next business day.
shipping.international_available_description: We offer international shipping to most countries. Delivery times vary by destination.
shipping.international_customs_description: International orders may be subject to customs duties and taxes. These charges are the responsibility of the recipient.
shipping.international_delivery_description: International delivery typically takes 10-20 business days depending on the destination and customs clearance.
shipping.tracking_info_description: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your order using:
shipping.tracking_step2: The tracking link in your shipping confirmation email
shipping.restrictions_description: Please note the following shipping restrictions:
shipping.restriction_item1: We cannot ship to P.O. boxes or military addresses
shipping.restriction_item2: Some remote areas may have additional delivery charges
shipping.restriction_item3: Certain products may have shipping restrictions based on regulations
shipping.contact_description: Our team is here to help with any shipping-related questions.

contact.page_subtitle: We're here to help with any questions or concerns
contact.form_success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.form_message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.faq_description: Check out our FAQ page for immediate answers to common questions.

faq.page_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about shopping with us
faq.order_q1: How do I place an order?
faq.order_a1: Browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to create an account or continue as a guest to complete your purchase.
faq.order_q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.order_a2: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay for your convenience.
faq.order_q3: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faq.order_a3: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting our customer service team. After this time, we may have already processed your order for shipping.
faq.order_a4: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.
faq.shipping_a1: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, while express shipping takes 2-3 business days. International orders typically arrive within 10-20 business days.
faq.shipping_a2: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $100. Orders under $100 have a flat shipping rate of $5.99.
faq.shipping_q3: How can I track my order?
faq.shipping_a3: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your package using this number in your account order history or on the carrier's website.
faq.shipping_a4: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination. Note that customs duties and taxes may apply.
faq.returns_a1: We offer a 7-day return policy. Items must be unused, unworn, with original tags and packaging. Contact us for a return authorization before sending your item back.
faq.returns_q2: How do I return an item?
faq.returns_a2: Email our support team with your order number and reason for return. We'll provide return instructions and a return authorization number. Once we receive and inspect your return, we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days.
faq.returns_a3: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the return is due to our error (defective item, wrong item shipped, etc.).
faq.returns_a4: Yes! We're happy to exchange items for a different size or color. Contact our customer service team to arrange an exchange.
faq.products_q1: How do I find the right size?
faq.products_a1: Each product page includes detailed size information and measurements. You can also refer to our size guide for specific measurements. If you're between sizes, we recommend sizing up.
faq.products_a2: Absolutely! All our products are 100% authentic and sourced directly from authorized manufacturers and distributors.
faq.products_q3: How do I care for my products?
faq.products_a3: Care instructions are included with each product and on the product page. Generally, we recommend following the care label instructions to maintain quality.
faq.products_a4: We try to restock popular items when possible. Sign up for product notifications on the item page to be notified when it's back in stock.
faq.account_q1: Do I need an account to shop?
faq.account_a1: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, save addresses, and access your order history easily.
faq.account_q2: How do I reset my password?
faq.account_a2: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email. We'll send you instructions to reset your password.
faq.account_q3: How is my personal information used?
faq.account_a3: We use your information to process orders, improve your shopping experience, and send promotional emails (if you've opted in). Read our Privacy Policy for full details.
faq.account_a4: Yes, you can request account deletion by contacting our customer service team. Please note this action is permanent and cannot be undone.
faq.help_description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer service team is ready to help.

about.page_subtitle: Discover the story behind our passion for quality craftsmanship
about.hero_description: We believe in creating timeless pieces that blend elegance with functionality
about.story_text: Founded in 2018, our journey began with a simple vision: to create premium accessories that combine timeless design with modern functionality. What started as a small workshop has grown into a brand trusted by customers worldwide. Every piece we create reflects our commitment to quality craftsmanship, sustainable practices, and attention to detail.
about.mission_text: To design and produce exceptional products that enhance everyday life while maintaining the highest standards of quality, sustainability, and ethical production.
about.value1_description: Every product is meticulously crafted using premium materials and traditional techniques, ensuring lasting beauty and durability.
about.value2_description: We're committed to reducing our environmental impact through responsible sourcing, eco-friendly materials, and ethical production.
about.value3_description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We stand behind every product and are dedicated to providing exceptional service.
about.commitment1_description: We source only the finest materials from trusted suppliers around the world.
about.commitment2_description: Our skilled artisans bring years of experience to every piece they create.
about.commitment3_description: We create pieces that transcend trends and remain elegant for years to come.
about.commitment4_description: From purchase to after-sales support, we're here to ensure your complete satisfaction.
about.cta_description: Discover products that combine beauty, quality, and functionality

privacy.page_subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your information.
privacy.intro_text: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or make a purchase. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.collection_personal_text: When you make a purchase or create an account, we collect information such as your name, email address, billing address, shipping address, phone number, and payment information.
privacy.collection_usage_text: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our site.
privacy.collection_cookies_text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from.
privacy.use_intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.use_item2: Communicate with you about your orders and account
privacy.use_item3: Send promotional emails (if you've opted in)
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
privacy.sharing_item1: Service providers who help us operate our business (payment processors, shipping companies)
privacy.sharing_item2: Law enforcement when required by law
privacy.cookies_text: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but some features may not function properly if you disable cookies.
privacy.security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.page_subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.use_text: You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict their use and enjoyment of the website.
terms.products_text: We make every effort to display product colors and details accurately. However, we cannot guarantee that your device's display will accurately reflect the actual colors of the products.
terms.pricing_text: All prices are listed in USD and are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to limit quantities and discontinue products at any time. Product availability is not guaranteed.
terms.orders_text: By placing an order, you are making an offer to purchase. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Payment must be received before products are shipped.
terms.shipping_text: Shipping times are estimates and not guaranteed. We are not responsible for delays caused by shipping carriers or customs. Risk of loss passes to you upon delivery to the carrier.
terms.returns_text: Please refer to our Returns Policy for detailed information about returns and refunds. Returns must be initiated within 7 days of delivery.
terms.ip_text: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is our property and protected by copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.
terms.accounts_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.liability_text: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or products. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the product.
terms.indemnification_text: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising from your use of our website or violation of these terms.
terms.governing_text: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law provisions.
terms.changes_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
terms.contact_text: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

shopping_guide.page_subtitle: Everything you need to know for a smooth shopping experience
shopping_guide.step1_description: Explore our curated collections of premium bags and accessories. Use filters to narrow down by category, price, color, and style to find exactly what you're looking for.
shopping_guide.step2_description: Click on any product to view detailed information, high-quality images, dimensions, materials, and customer reviews. Check size guides and care instructions.
shopping_guide.step3_description: Choose your preferred variant (color, size) and quantity, then add to cart. You can continue shopping or proceed to checkout. Your cart is saved for 30 days.
shopping_guide.step4_description: Enter your shipping information and select your preferred delivery method. Choose from multiple payment options including credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
shopping_guide.step5_description: After placing your order, you'll receive a confirmation email. Once shipped, we'll send tracking information so you can monitor your package's journey.
shopping_guide.step6_description: Receive your carefully packaged items and enjoy! If you have any concerns within 7 days, our returns process is easy and hassle-free.
shopping_guide.account_benefit3: Track multiple orders in one place
shopping_guide.account_benefit4: Exclusive member offers and early access
shopping_guide.tip1_description: Check product dimensions and our size guides to ensure the perfect fit
shopping_guide.tip2_description: Read reviews from verified customers to make informed decisions
shopping_guide.tip3_description: Save items to your wishlist to purchase later or share with friends
shopping_guide.tip4_description: Sign up for product alerts to be notified when out-of-stock items return
shopping_guide.cta_description: Discover our latest collections and find your perfect accessory

payment.page_subtitle: Safe, secure, and convenient payment options for your peace of mind
payment.intro_text: We offer multiple secure payment methods to make your shopping experience as convenient as possible. All transactions are encrypted and processed through industry-leading payment gateways.
payment.credit_cards_description: We accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. Your card information is encrypted and never stored on our servers.
payment.paypal_description: Shop securely using your PayPal account. Complete your purchase without sharing financial information with us directly. Link your bank account or credit card to PayPal.
payment.apple_pay_description: Fast and secure checkout with Apple Pay. Use Face ID, Touch ID, or passcode for quick authentication on your Apple devices.
payment.google_pay_description: Pay quickly and securely with Google Pay. Your card details stay protected and you can check out in just a few taps on Android devices.
payment.security_intro: Your security is our priority. We use industry-standard security measures:
payment.security_item5: We never store your complete card details
payment.billing_text: Your billing address must match the address associated with your payment method. This helps us verify your identity and prevent fraud. You'll receive an email receipt after your payment is processed.
payment.currency_text: All prices are displayed in USD. If your bank or card is in a different currency, your financial institution will handle the conversion and may charge additional fees.
payment.issues_intro: If your payment fails, please check:
payment.issue5: Your bank hasn't flagged the transaction as suspicious
payment.issues_help: Still having issues? Contact your card issuer or try a different payment method. Our support team is also available to help.
payment.refunds_text: Approved refunds are processed back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days. The time for funds to appear in your account depends on your financial institution.
payment.cta_description: Our customer service team is here to help with any payment concerns

care_guide.page_subtitle: Keep your accessories looking beautiful for years to come
care_guide.intro_text: Proper care will help maintain the beauty and longevity of your bags and accessories. Follow these guidelines to keep your items in pristine condition.
care_guide.general_tip1_desc: Wipe down your bag regularly with a soft, dry cloth to remove dust and prevent buildup.
care_guide.general_tip2_desc: Don't overstuff your bag as this can cause stretching, distortion, and stress on seams and handles.
care_guide.general_tip3_desc: Keep your bag away from direct sunlight, rain, and extreme temperatures to prevent damage and fading.
care_guide.general_tip4_desc: Avoid placing your bag on rough surfaces and be gentle with zippers, clasps, and other hardware.
care_guide.leather_cleaning_text: Use a soft, slightly damp cloth for routine cleaning. For deeper cleaning, use a leather-specific cleaner. Test any product on a hidden area first.
care_guide.leather_conditioning_text: Apply a quality leather conditioner every 3-6 months to keep the leather supple and prevent cracking. Use sparingly and buff excess with a soft cloth.
care_guide.leather_water_text: If your leather bag gets wet, blot immediately with a dry cloth. Let it air dry naturally away from heat sources. Never use a hairdryer.
care_guide.canvas_cleaning_text: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild soap. For stubborn stains, use a soft brush with gentle circular motions. Air dry completely before storing.
care_guide.canvas_stains_text: Treat stains promptly for best results. Mix mild detergent with water, apply to stain, gently scrub, and rinse with clean water.
care_guide.suede_brush_text: Use a suede brush to restore the nap and remove surface dirt. Always brush in one direction following the natural grain.
care_guide.suede_protection_text: Apply a suede protector spray before first use and reapply regularly. This creates a barrier against water and stains.
care_guide.suede_avoid_text: Suede is particularly water-sensitive. If it gets wet, stuff with paper and let air dry. Use a suede brush once dry to restore texture.
care_guide.storage_tip1: Store bags in dust bags or pillowcases in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
care_guide.storage_tip2: Stuff bags with tissue paper or bubble wrap to maintain shape during storage.
care_guide.storage_tip3: Store bags upright or laying flat - never hang by straps as this can cause stretching.
care_guide.storage_tip4: Ensure bags are clean and completely dry before storing to prevent mold and mildew.
care_guide.avoid_item1: Harsh chemicals, bleach, or abrasive cleaners that can damage materials
care_guide.avoid_item2: Direct heat sources like radiators, hairdryers, or direct sunlight
care_guide.avoid_item3: Plastic bags for storage, which can trap moisture and cause damage
care_guide.avoid_item4: Placing bags directly on the floor or rough surfaces
care_guide.avoid_item5: Using colored cloths that might transfer dye onto light-colored bags
care_guide.avoid_item6: Exposing bags to perfumes, hand sanitizers, or makeup which can stain
care_guide.professional_text: For valuable items or stubborn issues, consider professional cleaning and restoration services. They offer:
care_guide.cta_description: Contact our customer service team for specific care recommendations for your product
